item.description: Wouldn’t it be convenient if you could mirror your Android device’s screen onto your PC and interact with it? I have just the right tool for this job that lets you do all this and more and it’s called “scrcpy”. It is a tool created by folks at Genymotion. What you’ll need Android device with Lollipop (API 21 / Android 5.0) or newer with USB debugging turned on. adb - Android debugging bridge.
